name: Advanced Graphics Mickey Mouse Life-Size Cardboard Stand-Up

reviews.name: Advanced Graphics Mickey Mouse Life-Size Cardboard Stand-Up
reviews.reviewText: This product is exactly as described. It's strudy and will be great for pictures with the birthday boy and our guests. I can't wait to use it!
reviews.title: Great party decoration!

reviews.name: Advanced Graphics Mickey Mouse Life-Size Cardboard Stand-Up
reviews.reviewText:
We had a Mickey Mouse themed b-day for our 2yr old son and this was perfect! the kids came and stood by it and we were able to get really cute pictures. It's been a hit for my son since his party -- everything is "let me show Mickey." I'm having a hard time getting rid of it.
Only thing i would change is the stand in the back. It's not as simple as the directions show but if you have packing tape or duct tape - it can easily be supported. Great over-all! Would buy another character in the future without hesitation.
reviews.title: Great for a child's birthday!

reviews.name: Advanced Graphics Mickey Mouse Life-Size Cardboard Stand-Up
reviews.reviewText: the cardboard is thick enough to be durable. the color was bright and perfect for my son's B-day party.
reviews.title: A great buy for my son's party!!
